Title: The Routine
Plot: In the "Emerald City" experimental unit of Oswald State Penitentiary, we meet some of the diverse inmates who live within a pecking order of Homeboys, Latinos, Muslims, Irish, Aryans, and Wiseguys. No clear-cut leader emerges -- with the possible exception of Kareem Said, a Muslim author who preaches non-violence and abstinence. Said's arrival doesn't prevent a short-fused Mafia inmate named Dino Ortolani from ticking off just about everybody--a habit that ends up burning him.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Jose Soto, Philip Scozzarella, Douglas Crosby, Jon Seda, Desiree Marie Velez, George E.M. Kelly, Derrick Simmons, Tim McAdams, Goodfella Mike G., O.L. Duke, Steve Ryan, Tim Carr
